gospel.text:
[[Mt 12,46]]While Jesus was speaking to the crowds, his mother and his brothers appeared outside, wishing to speak with him.
[[Mt 12,47]]Someone told him, "Your mother and your brothers are standing outside, asking to speak with you."
[[Mt 12,48]]But he said in reply to the one who told him, "Who is my mother? Who are my brothers?"
[[Mt 12,49]]And stretching out his hand toward his disciples, he said, "Here are my mother and my brothers.
[[Mt 12,50]]For whoever does the will of my heavenly Father is my brother, and sister, and mother."
gospel.title: Holy Gospel of Jesus Christ according to Saint Matthew

first_reading.title: Book of Micah

psalm.text:
[[Ps 85,2]]You have favored, O LORD, your land; 
you have brought back the captives of Jacob.
[[Ps 85,3]]You have forgiven the guilt of your people; 
you have covered all their sins.
[[Ps 85,4]]You have withdrawn all your wrath; 
you have revoked your burning anger.

[[Ps 85,5]]Restore us, O God our savior, 
And abandon your displeasure against us.
[[Ps 85,6]]Will you be ever angry with us, 
prolonging your anger to all generations?

[[Ps 85,7]]Will you not instead give us life; 
and shall not your people rejoice in you?
[[Ps 85,8]]Show us, O LORD, your kindness, 
and grant us your salvation.
psalm.title: Psalms
